description:
Very funny motocross desert rally game!
Drive your motor bike dodging obstacles along the roads of the desert in Dakar.
Try now this trial motorbike game and you won't want to play another rally game!

A realistic 3D rallies game
This adventure race takes place in the desert in Dakar, as if you were a driver in this famous race.
You will drive a realistic dirt bike in 3D through the desert, and you must overcome different stages with obstacles to reach the next level.
But beware! You have to refill fuel to not run out mid-race.

If you like motorcycle racing this is your game, drive as if you were driving a real trial bike to reach the last level.
Each new level is more difficult. Compete with your friends to see who exceeds more levels on their mobile, demonstrating their skills in this funny race.

You can do loopings and stunts with your dirt bike that will add more score to beat the record.
Share your scores on social networks and challenge your friends to see who is able to overcome them!

Download now this funny motocross game and overcome all stages of the rally in the desert in Dakar.
It's very addictive!
